A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: People who are saying its perfect or flawless are tripping. and people who think its less then a 6 are also trippin. there are some  superfluous  characters and a subplot that is completely unnecessary. but besides that....its everything youd want in a star wars movie. the acting has never been better the light saber duels are FIRE. the pacing is hurt by the sub plot i mentioned earlier but the overall experience it still good for any true star wars fan. its a little darker then most star wars so it mite turn some people off. they also try to balance with comic relive but i feel it was slightly overplayed at times. over all a good movie.
